text: wmn almunafiqin qawm yudhun rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam balklam, wyqwlwn: 'iinah yastamie likuli maa yuqal lah fysdqh, qul lahum -ayha alnby-: 'iina mhmdana hu 'udhun tastamie likuli khyr, yumin biallah wysdq almuminin fima ykhbrwnh, wahu rahmatan liman 'atabieh wahtda bhdah. waladhin yudhun rasul allah mhmdana salaa allah ealayh wasalam bi'ayi nawe min 'anwae al'iydha', lahum eadhab mulim mwje
